column2: we found our waitress to be very helpful. The menu was a little overwhelming
column3: so my friend and I decided to split the tasting menu
column4: which included 10 dishes. We also ordered the brie and brusselsprouts on the side. Every single dish was amazing! I've never had brusslesprouts
column5: but now I am a fan. The way they cooked and seasoned them was absolutely perfect! And I'm a bit of a brie snob
column6: and found their brie dish just as delicious.
